Resource and property changes are indicated with this symbol:
  - Delete

The deployment will update the following scope:

Scope: /subscriptions/12345678-1234-1234-1234-123456789012/resourceGroups/rg-production

  - Microsoft.Sql/servers/databases/productiondb [2021-11-01]

      id:   "/subscriptions/12345678-1234-1234-1234-123456789012/resourceGroups/rg-production/providers/Microsoft.Sql/servers/sqlserver/databases/productiondb"
      name: "productiondb"
      type: "Microsoft.Sql/servers/databases"

  - Microsoft.Storage/storageAccounts/oldstorageacct [2023-01-01]

      id:   "/subscriptions/12345678-1234-1234-1234-123456789012/resourceGroups/rg-production/providers/Microsoft.Storage/storageAccounts/oldstorageacct"
      name: "oldstorageacct"
      type: "Microsoft.Storage/storageAccounts"

Resource changes: 2 to delete.
